headline: Monomoy Property Ventures and Axonic Capital Acquire 590 West Peachtree Street in Atlanta; Plans Conversion to Flagship Marriott Brand
summary: Monomoy Property Ventures ("Monomoy"), a real estate investment firm focused on redeveloping high-value hospitality and mixed-use assets, and Axonic Capital, a real estate-focused investment manager, announced the acquisition 590 West Peachtree Street in Atlanta. The property will soon undergo a substantial capital investment program led by Monomoy in partnership with a best-in-class architect and design team, and be repositioned under the Marriott Hotels brand, Marriott International's flagship

content.title: Monomoy Property Ventures and Axonic Capital Acquire 590 West Peachtree Street in Atlanta; Plans Conversion to Flagship Marriott Brand

thumbnail.caption: Marriott Atlanta set to open in late 2027
